feed.title: Cypress Hills (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cypress Hills (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 12:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -14.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -16.5°C
Wind: SE 19 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
